sentences.en: A memorial service was held yesterday at Wadhurst Parish Church. The Rev Michael Inch officiated.
sentences.cn: 昨天，悼念仪式在沃德赫斯特堂区教堂举行，迈克尔·英奇牧师担任主持。

sentences.en: Every parish was named after a saint.
sentences.cn: 每个教区都以某位圣徒的名字命名。

sentences.en: Father Doyle moved to a new parish.
sentences.cn: 多伊尔神父调到了新的教区。

sentences.en: He really seemed to look upon himself as the most important person in the parish.
sentences.cn: 他那个派头,俨然整个教区首屈一指的人物了.

sentences.en: He was a warden at the local parish church.
sentences.cn: 他是本地教区教堂的管理员。

sentences.en: He was wedded already to his books and his parish.
sentences.cn: 他早已同他的书本和教区结了不解之缘.

sentences.en: I'll discover the parish of that parishioner.
sentences.cn: 我会找到这个教民所属的教区。

sentences.en: Municipal town and rural parish gradually made fresh threads of connection.
sentences.cn: 城市和乡村逐渐形成了千丝万缕的新关系.

sentences.en: Parish priests have referred to it in their sermons.
sentences.cn: 堂区牧师在布道中提到了它。

sentences.en: People served a spaghetti supper in the parish house.
sentences.cn: 人们在教堂交谊厅吃意大利面晚餐.

sentences.en: The Holy Family Church was closed and the parish now celebrates mass in this simple side chapel.
sentences.cn: 圣家堂关闭了，现在该教区的居民在它旁边的简陋的小教堂里做弥撒。

sentences.en: The main source for family reconstitution is the parish register.
sentences.cn: 重新构画家庭的主要资料来源是教区的记事录.

sentences.en: The parish has welcomed the new vicar with open arms.
sentences.cn: 教区居民双手欢迎新来的牧师.

sentences.en: The parish priest is someone to whom people can turn in difficult times.
sentences.cn: 牧区牧师是人们在困难时可以求助的人.

sentences.en: The priest visited all the old people in the parish.
sentences.cn: 牧师探望了教区里的所有老人.

trans.tran_cn: 教区以下的地方行政区，（英国）郡以下的行政区
trans.tran_en: the area that a priest in some Christian churches is responsible for
